amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow bridge work to be done despite the presence of swallows if the bridge has a condition rating of 3 or less until a rulemaking has occurred; require notification to the Secretary of Interior, and also direct the Secretary to promulgate a rulemaking to allow for bridge work under the Migratory Bird Treaty Act (MBTA).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mullin amendment (A013) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Mullin to the Rules amendment (A001).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Mullin amendment (A013) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Mullin to the Rules amendment (A001).
